a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Energy consumption is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh). Here an inefficiency factor has been applied for fossil
fuels, meaning the shares by each energy source give a better approximation of final energy consumption.
Source: BP Statistical Review of World Energy (2019)
Note: 'Other renewables' includes geothermal, biomass and waste energy.
